Wishing him all the best for his future endeavors.‚Äù

Vipul Jain ‚ÄúIt was a pleasure working with Madhur during his internship at Infinyte Club, and I am consistently impressed by his exceptional work ethic, intelligence, and adaptability. Madhur has consistently demonstrated his ability to quickly grasp new topics and deliver high-quality work in record time, making them an invaluable asset to our team. His ability to quickly dive deep into a subject/topic and interest in start-up and VC space finds a special mention. He is curious to learn and grow every day.
